name: Bookdirect
overview:
BOOKDirect hotel reservations system (bookdirect.com) is a proven system of hotel reservations, marketing and distribution technology guaranteed to put “heads in beds” and provide a unique competitive advantage for hoteliers.

Founded in 1995, BOOKDirect provides reservations technology to hotels, hotel management groups, destination management organizations as well as offering an affiliate program enabling virtually any website to earn revenue from hotel reservations (see http://partnersinprofit.bookdirect.com for more information).

BOOKDirect has unique functionality of interest to Convention and Visitor Bureaus whereby city-wide packages can be set up as well as enabling the Destination marketing organization the ability to create their own affiliate program.

Bookdirect gets rates directly from the hotels and/or their central reservations system. The rates found in Bookdirect are some of the very best that you will see available ANYWHERE (see http://bestrates.bookdirect.com for more information).

Bookings made through Bookdirect are risk-free as the hotel bookings are made directly with the hotel and at NO TIME is the hotel guest’s credit card charged. Nor does BOOKDirect charge any sort of cancellation fee - one is free to cancel any booking without a penalty (subject to the hotel’s own policies relating to cancellations).

BOOKDirect Hotels in the United States Http://US.Bookdirect.com/
